content: My name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Mister Schmidt, who is the potential landlord.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was negotiating the rental price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 825 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome as an 8.
name: Yi-Nuo
